Douglas Fairbanks, Jr. KBE DSC (December 9, 1909 Ã¢â‚¬â€œ May 7, 2000) was an American actor and a highly decorated naval officer of World War II. His films included The Prisoner of Zenda (1937), and Gunga Din (1939).
